title: Abdul Qadeer Khan, known as the father of Pakistan's nuclear bomb, has died at 85
content:
1. Abdul Qadeer Khan, known as the father of Pakistan's nuclear bomb, has died at 85  NPR
  2. 'Father of Pakistan's nuclear bomb' Abdul Qadeer Khan dies - BBC News  BBC News
  3. AQ Khan, father of Pakistan's atomic bomb and centre of proliferation scandal, dies  Yahoo News
  4. Opinion | Joe Biden may hurt Imran Khan’s oversized ego, but won’t go far enough to hurt Pakistan  Firstpost
  5. Pakistan's AQ Khan, who illegally sold nuclear technology to Iran, Libya and N Korea, passes away  Hindustan Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Abdul Qadeer Khan, known as the father of Pakistan's nuclear bomb, has died at 85  NPR
'Father of Pakistan's nuclear bomb' Abdul Qadeer Khan dies - BBC News  BBC News
AQ Khan, father of Pakistan's atomic bomb and centre of proliferation scandal, dies  Yahoo News
Opinion | Joe Biden may hurt Imran Khan’s oversized ego, but won’t go far enough to hurt Pakistan  Firstpost
